mapper.insert:
insert into po_pomain (po_id, c_po_id, c_modify_time, d_po_date, c_ven_code, c_dep_code, c_exch_name, nflat, i_tax_rate, c_memo, c_state, c_maker, c_verifier, c_closer, c_define1, c_define2, i_vt_id, c_changer, c_bus_type, c_make_time, c_audit_time, c_audit_date, c_modify_date, c_reviser, c_ven_puom_protocol, c_chang_verifier, c_chang_audit_time, c_chang_audit_date, d_close_date, d_close_time, c_contact_code, c_ven_person, c_sysbar_code, c_current_auditor) values
(#{item.poid}, #{item.cpoid}, #{item.cmodifytime}, #{item.dpodate}, #{item.cvencode}, #{item.cdepcode}, #{item.cexchName}, #{item.nflat}, #{item.itaxrate}, #{item.cmemo}, #{item.cstate}, #{item.cmaker}, #{item.cverifier}, #{item.ccloser}, #{item.cdefine1}, #{item.cdefine2}, #{item.ivtid}, #{item.cchanger}, #{item.cbustype}, #{item.cmaketime}, #{item.caudittime}, #{item.cauditdate}, #{item.cmodifydate}, #{item.creviser}, #{item.cvenpuomprotocol}, #{item.cchangverifier}, #{item.cchangaudittime}, #{item.cchangauditdate}, #{item.dclosedate}, #{item.dclosetime}, #{item.ccontactcode}, #{item.cvenperson}, #{item.csysbarcode}, #{item.ccurrentauditor})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE po_id = values(po_id), c_po_id = values(c_po_id), c_modify_time = values(c_modify_time), d_po_date = values(d_po_date), c_ven_code = values(c_ven_code), c_dep_code = values(c_dep_code), c_exch_name = values(c_exch_name), nflat = values(nflat), c_memo = values(c_memo), c_state = values(c_state), c_maker = values(c_maker), c_verifier = values(c_verifier), c_closer = values(c_closer), c_define1 = values(c_define1), c_define2 = values(c_define2), i_vt_id = values(i_vt_id), c_changer = values(c_changer), c_bus_type = values(c_bus_type), c_make_time = values(c_make_time), c_audit_time = values(c_audit_time), c_audit_date = values(c_audit_date), c_modify_date = values(c_modify_date), c_reviser = values(c_reviser), c_ven_puom_protocol = values(c_ven_puom_protocol), c_chang_verifier = values(c_chang_verifier), c_chang_audit_time = values(c_chang_audit_time), d_close_date = values(d_close_date), d_close_time = values(d_close_time), c_contact_code = values(c_contact_code), c_ven_person = values(c_ven_person), c_sysbar_code = values(c_sysbar_code), c_current_auditor = values(c_current_auditor)
